item.title: Galton board simulation in Python
item.description: A \$5 bill saved is a \$5 bill earned. This is an inline \(a^*=x-b^*\) equation. These are block equations: \[a^*=x-b^*\] \[ a^*=x-b^* \] \[ a^*=x-b^* \] These are block equations using alternate delimiters: $$a^*=x-b^*$$ $$ a^*=x-b^* $$ $$ a^*=x-b^* $$ Sketch of the ideas: Consider each sampling of the balls as a 1-dimensional random walk, which takes only two possible directions: left or right, at each step.
